name: Mine Shot
description:
Mine Shot is my first mini-game written during "Crunchless Challenge" game jam. It is a typical platformer shooter set in an abandoned mine. The player's task is to get as many points as possible during his escapade.

The game was written in Python and Pygame. It is not a masterpiece, but I have learned a lot while working on it, which will make my future games much better.

The game is not finished yet (and I don't know if it will ever be), however I still need to add music, sound and more weapons which I will do in the near future.

Edit: well, unconsciously I made a game very similar to Spelunky. I even set the same controls. It was really a coincidence, I swear.

Controls:

  • arrow keys to move
  • Z  to jump
  • X to shoot
  • C to use special attack
